    所有类和接口

    类
    说明
    AIChatPanel
    AI聊天面板，支持与AI财务顾问进行对话
    AIChatService
    处理与AI聊天API的所有交互
    AIChatService.StreamResponseHandler
     
    AIChatServiceTest
    Tests for AIChatService class Tests AI chat functionality and transaction data analysis
    AIClassifier
    AI Classifier Implements simple classification logic and holiday detection
    AlertService
    Alert Service Handles alert generation, persistence, and notification
    AlertService.Alert
    Alert data model
    AlertService.AlertLevel
     
    AlertService.AlertNotificationHandler
    Alert Notification Handler interface
    AlertService.GuiNotificationHandler
    GUI notification handler - to be implemented by the view
    AuthController
    Authentication Controller Handles user authentication, registration, and session management
    AuthControllerTest
    Tests for AuthController class Tests user registration, login, and other authentication operations
    BackgroundPanel
    Background Panel A JPanel with background image support
    BudgetCalculator
    Budget Calculator Interface Used to calculate budgets and expense statistics Reserved for future extensions
    CategoryManagementPanel
    Category Management Panel Combines category summary and editing functionality
    ChatBubbleFactory
    聊天气泡工厂类，用于创建聊天界面的各种气泡组件
    ChatBubbleFactory.RoundedBorder
    自定义圆角边框
    CSVHandler
    CSV文件处理工具类 负责读写交易数据到CSV文件
    DashboardPanel
    Dashboard Panel Main welcome screen after login, displaying financial overview and quick links
    ExpenseAlertPanel
    Expense Alert Panel Displays alert information when individual category or total expenses exceed set thresholds
    ExpenseAlertPanelTest
     
    LocalConsumptionPanel
     
    LocalizedFinancePanel
     
    LoginPanel
    Login Panel Displays login form and handles login validation
    LoginPanel.LoginCallback
    Login callback interface
    MainFrame
    Main Window Frame Using JTabbedPane to display different functional modules
    PasswordUtils
    Password utility class Provides methods for hashing and verifying passwords
    RegisterPanel
    Register Panel Displays registration form and handles user registration
    RegisterPanel.RegisterCallback
    Register callback interface
    SimpleBudgetCalculator
    Simple Budget Calculator Calculates monthly expenses and generates budget suggestions
    StatisticsPanel
    Statistics View Panel Display monthly expense statistics and budget suggestions
    TestUtils
     
    Transaction
    Entity class representing a financial transaction Contains basic information like date, amount, category, description etc.
    TransactionController
    Transaction Controller Processes business logic between models and views
    TransactionPanel
    Transaction Entry Panel Contains transaction form and transaction list
    TransactionPanelTest
     
    TransactionService
     
    UIConstants
    UI Constants and Helper Methods Centralized definition of all UI-related constants to ensure consistency
    User
    User model class Represents a registered user in the application
    UserDAO
    User Data Access Object Handles persistence of user data
